特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Most sessions will begin with a detailed explanation of one step involved in the preparation of an academic essay. This will be followed by group work that will require students to demonstrate an understanding of that step. Following this, students will address that step with regard to their own essay topic. Finally, students will share their own essay drafts with their classmates and give peer feedback. As the term progresses, less time will be devoted to explaining new steps, and more time devoted to sharing and checking drafts.
